content: christmas pudding bauble knitting pattern by amanda berry email fluffandfuzz@googlemail com - website fluffandfuzz@weebly com yarn needles & notions - each bauble uses dk weight yarn double knitting - a pair of 3 5mm us 4 single pointed needles or light worsted weight a few grammes in each minimum length 20cm of brown and cream for the pudding plus green - a darning or tapestry needle for seaming and red for the holly leaves and berries - a large handful of toy filling - recommended yarns are hayfield bonus dk stylecraft special dk and paintbox yarns simply dk these are 100% acrylic dk weight yarns available in a wide range of colours christmas pudding bauble copyright © 2014 amanda berry page 1 of 3 notes knitting pattern introduction knit this little pudding to decorate pudding your christmas tree the holly topper could also make 1 cast on 9 sts in brown on 3 5mm needles be used to add a handmade touch to christmas using the long tail cast on start at the bottom cards or gift-wrap row 1 ws purl work flat the bauble is knitted flat back and row 2 rs kfb 8 times k1 17 sts forth on a pair of single pointed knitting needles not in the round row 3 purl one size the pudding is 6cm tall row 4 k1 kfb 8 times k1 25 sts gauge 24 sts x 30 row for a 10cm x 10cm square row 5 purl in stockinette stitch on 3 5mm needles don t worry row 6 k2 kfb 8 times k1 33 sts about gauge for this pattern it is not critical row 7 to 9 starting on a ws purl row work 3 row in st st abbreviations row 10 k3 kfb 8 times k1 41 sts k knit row 11 to 12 starting on a ws purl row work 2 row in st st k2tog knit two stitches together decrease by 1 join cream yarn for fair-isle colour-work kfb knit into the front and back increase by 1 row 13 in cream p1 in brown p1 to the last lh left hand stitch in cream p1 41 sts p purl break the brown yarn and continue in cream p2tog purl two stitches together decrease by 1 row 14 to 15 starting on a rs knit row work 2 repeat repeat row in st st rh right hand row 16 k3 k2tog 8 times k1 33 sts rs right side row 17 to 19 starting on a ws purl row work 3 st s stitch es row in st st st st stockinette knit and purl alternate row row 20 k2 k2tog 8 times k1 25 sts ws wrong side row 21 purl row 22 k1 k2tog 8 times k1 17 sts row 23 purl copyright © 2014 amanda berry this free pattern is for personal use only not for resale row 24 k2tog 8 times k1 9 sts all patterns designed by amanda berry are protected
